Steps.Message: Hi, Lee here from the text messaging team. I wanted to apologise that you are still without supply. Each job is different, but we provide our estimated times based on similar jobs we have completed in your area. The times given are always subject to how each fault develops. For this reason, please rest assured that I will be regularly looking for updates and will continue to send you messages with new information.

We became aware of a power cut at 19:52. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Hi, Lee here from the text messaging team. I wanted to apologise that you are still without supply. Each job is different, but we provide our estimated times based on similar jobs we have completed in your area. The times given are always subject to how each fault develops. For this reason, please rest assured that I will be regularly looking for updates and will continue to send you messages with new information.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
